titleStmt.title: A testimony for the Lord and his truth given forth by the women friends, at their yearly meeting, at York, being a tender salutation of love, to their friends and sisters, in their several monthly meetings, in this county, and else where, greeting.

A testimony for the Lord and his truth given forth by the women friends, at their yearly meeting, at York, being a tender salutation of love, to their friends and sisters, in their several monthly meetings, in this county, and else where, greeting.
titleStmt.author: Waite, Mary. Warning to all Friends who professeth the everlasting truth of God.$4aut.

notesStmt.note: "A warning to all friends, who profess the everlasting truth of God" has caption title on p. 10; register and pagination are continuous.
"A warning" is signed at end: Mary Waite. Yorke 10th. 2d. month 1679.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
